name: PixelPro
overview:
PixelPro is a web design, development and digital marketing solutions company based out of Adyar, Chennai, India.

Since inception in 2008, PixelPro has been successfully able to manage its vast clientele from across the world by providing them with various design and development services.

Design Professionals at PixelPro are well versed and experienced in using Photoshop, Illustrator and Adobe Flash. Web and technology developers are highly experienced individuals in customizing CMS including Joomla, wordpress, opencart and customized application development in LAMP stack and by using Java, JEE technologies including Struts2, Spring and Hibernate etc.,

PixelPro has been handing clients across various industries including Real Estate, Insurance, Banking and Financial segment, Entertainment industry etc.,
